description: Silence ads in Accuradio, Spotify.. or any Custom App. Lightweight under 150KB. Features: - Mute ads on Accuradio, Spotify (Full & Lite), Pandora, Soundcloud or Any app with Custom App Option - Casting Support: Supports casting (Google Chromecast, etc) - Fully Configurable: Edit preloaded apps, add new custom apps, and adjust keywords or unmute delays for precise control. - Debug Log View: Integrated logging for easy troubleshooting. - Minimal UI & Lightweight (~ 150KB) - No bloat/external dependencies - All locally processed, no data collection - No inapp purchases or ads - Open source If you want to know on how this works & more.. check github.
